title: Kanye West decided to run for the president. Is even he fed up with Donald Trump now? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, he is actually helping Trump win by an even higher margin! He will take a lot of the millennial votes that otherwise would have voted for Biden now that they have someone who better supports their interests, he also will take a lot of minority votes from Biden since they too have someone who will represent them instead of some old white guy that hasn’t voted in the interests of black people during his career as a congressman.

Kanye thinks the country can do better than Biden, a 77 year old with dementia who has lived off the public trough his entire life, has never had an original thought, has never had an accomplishment, and has Harvey Weinstein types of issues. Kayne West is a very successful businessman who understands what it means to meet a payroll.Kayne West is an active philanthropist who has been on a mission to battle dropout and illiteracy rates while being a strong advocate for social justice.
